quest.name: Sweet as Honey
journal:
Uin Nee is anxious about their dealings with the Nu Mou.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Survey the designated location north of Phisor Lran and slay a sweet echevore for its tail.
Deliver the echevore tail to Uin Nee.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Well, if it isn't my favorite mortal! And do you know why you're my favorite? Why, it's because you have a knack for showing up precisely when I need something done. Like now, for example!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: You see, I've asked a Nu Mou crafter to craft me a delightful new toy to bring to the children in their dreams, and I promised I'd repay them with something very, very special─an echevore tail, to be precise!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Have you ever seen an echevore tail? You can smell them or sip from them, and they have the taste and aroma of sweet, sweet honey! A bit too sweet for my liking, to tell the truth, but the Nu Mou just can't seem to get enough of them.

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: But there's a bit of a rub. The sweetest of the sweet echevores can only be found distressingly close to the stamping grounds of those oh-so-nasty Fuath. Just imagining being gripped in those slimy, slippery, slobbery hands makes me─ick! Why did you make me think such unpleasant thoughts!?

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Hmph! As penance, I demand that you go forth and fetch the echevore tail that I seek! And if you see any Fuath along the way, feel free to smack them in their smarmy faces with those stupid little hats of theirs!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: <sniff> Is that sweet, sweet honey I smell? I knew you wouldn't come back empty-handed! Well, hand it over then, already!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Why, I say, this is the sweetest aroma I've ever had the pleasure of smelling! Perhaps those Nu Mou do know what they're talking about. Perhaps they won't mind if I take just a teeny-tiny smidgen...

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: Ahem! Which is to say, of course I'm not thinking of taking a sip! We pixies have far more refined palates than those silly Nu Mou. We're not ones to sit around all day sucking on these icky tails!

dialogue.name: UINNEE
dialogue.text: At any rate, thank you as always for being so subser─er, helpful! So helpful! Please come back again soon! Now, just a tiny little... Hmm? You're still here?
